summary: This document is an email chain from August 2019 between staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding an inmate's complaint about psychiatric medication. The inmate, Feliciano Favela, accuses the psychiatrist of negligence and explicitly links the complaint to the neglect surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death, which had occurred days earlier.

persons.name: Feliciano Favela
persons.context: An inmate at MCC New York assigned to plumbing work who is in a dispute with the psychiatric staff over medication side effects and accuses them of negligence related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Dr. I
persons.context: A psychiatrist at MCC New York who is following inmate Favela's case and is the target of Favela's accusations regarding medication and negligence.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.context: A prison administrator at MCC New York who is copied on the email chain regarding the inmate's complaint.

connections.description: Inmate Favela is under the psychiatric care of Dr. I and is disputing the prescribed medication, accusing the doctor of negligence.
The Associate Warden is copied on administrative correspondence regarding Favela's complaint about medical care.

events.title: Inmate Medication Complaint
events.description: Inmate Feliciano Favela sends a message complaining that his psychiatric medication causes migraines and a metallic taste, and accuses the psychiatrist of negligence.

events.title: Psychiatrist's Response to Inmate
events.description: A psychiatrist responds to inmate Favela, stating he has been non-compliant with medication and should use sick call for further issues.

events.title: Inmate Accuses Staff of Epstein Negligence
events.description: Inmate Favela escalates his complaint, explicitly stating he hopes the psychiatrist is involved with 'epsteins neglect' and gets fired.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: An inmate at MCC New York, Feliciano Favela, was in a dispute with psychiatric staff over medication side effects in August 2019.
The inmate explicitly accuses the psychiatrist of being involved in the 'neglect' surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death, hoping they get fired.
The email chain shows internal prison communication regarding inmate complaints being forwarded to administrators like the Associate Warden.
The document is dated August 15, 2019, days after Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility on August 10, 2019, indicating immediate inmate reactions linking their treatment to that event.
